short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a timestamp on top of video sites like Amazon Video, YouTube, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a timestamp on top of video sites like Amazon Video, YouTube, and more for fullscreen support. Perfect for presentations where participants need to know the timestamp for citations. The timestamp can be dragged into place and disabled by opening the addon.

A userscript version for Safari and Firefox is available at https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/454277-big-timestamp
